name: Legal Services - Restraining Orders
description: An attorney on staff assists clients with restraining orders in cooperation with the Cooperative Restraining Order Clinic (CROC). They do not provide other legal assistance.
fullDescription: An attorney on staff assists clients with restraining orders in cooperation with the Cooperative Restraining Order Clinic (CROC). They do not provide other legal assistance.
whatTheyOffer: An attorney on staff assists clients with restraining orders in cooperation with the Cooperative Restraining Order Clinic (CROC). They do not provide other legal assistance.
howToGetIt: For more information, you may reach them at 1.888.260.1498 or info@blackwomenrevolt.org
